Wed, 15 May 2024 17:23:08 +0000 A woman parked her car and went inside a dairy on the corner of Queen and Cameron streets in Waitara, Taranaki, and it was taken last Friday.

Cyclone Gabrielle victims say quick removal of slash can save lives https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/05/16/cyclone-gabrielle-victims-say-quick-removal-of-slash-can-save-lives/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/05/16/cyclone-gabrielle-victims-say-quick-removal-of-slash-can-save-lives/ Wynsley WrigleySubmitters to Gisborne District Council want slash removed as it builds up. Wed, 15 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Marian Drive residents want the Gladstone Road Bridge and other city bridges cleared of slash more quickly to minimise property damage and potentially save lives. That was one submission made to yesterday's Gisborne District Council's hearing on its Three-Year Plan.
